name: Holiday Planner [Notion Template]
description: Plan Your Holidays with Notion!Welcome fellow avid traveller! Are you about to embark on your next adventure? If so, plan your trip with this holiday planner that I created in Notion. What You Can Expect:Keep track of all your holiday trips (past and future)Plan out your entire itinerary within the calendar plannerLook up all your intended attractions, accommodations and activities easilyWhat You'll Get:1x Holiday Planner Workspace1x Itinerary Calendar Planner1x Locations Master Database1x Expen
features: Keep track of all your holiday trips (past and future); Plan out your entire itinerary within the calendar planner; Look up all your intended attractions, accommodations and activities easily; 1x Holiday Planner Workspace; 1x Itinerary Calendar Planner; 1x Locations Master Database; 1x Expenses Tracker; 1x Documents Vault; Download this template and duplicate it to your Notion workspace; Read the guiding prompts
